synopsis.text: The heartwarming tale of a boy and his pet fish unfolds in this captivating anime, crafted by the talented Onohana during her time at the Tokyo University of the Arts. One day, the pet fish expresses an unexpected desire to leave its familiar surroundings, compelling the young boy to honor his promise and embark on a journey to release the fish into the vast ocean. Along the way, the pair's memories of their time together subtly diverge, adding a touch of melancholy to their heartfelt adventure. This poignant exploration of friendship and the bonds we share is sure to resonate with viewers and leave a lasting impression.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
